attributes.action: STOP the suffering of horses in the EU.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Horses are still suffering unnecessarily as they are packed into overcrowded teucks and driven thousands of miles across Europe to Slaughter. The international league for the protection of horses and other welfare orginisations have evidence that there is a consistent lack of enforcement of EU Regulation (EC) 1/2005. This includes; no individual partitions failure to feed, water and rest horses during journeys; and lorries travelling for over 24 hours without stoping.
